definition: not distracted by anything unrelated to the goal, something of value given by one person to another to bind a contract
details:
adjective
- not distracted by anything unrelated to the goal
= synonyms: businesslike
- characterized by a firm and humorless belief in the validity of your opinions
= example: characterized by a firm and humorless belief in the validity of your opinions
= synonyms: sincere, solemn
- earnest
= synonyms: dear
noun
- something of value given by one person to another to bind a contract
